name: RSTC Medical Statement
description: Recreational Scuba Training Council Medical Questionnaire. Required before diving activities.

metadata.instructions: Please answer all questions honestly. A 'Yes' answer to any question does not necessarily disqualify you from diving but may require a physician's evaluation.

questions.question_text: Have you ever had or do you currently have any of the following: High blood pressure, angina, heart attack, heart surgery, or other cardiovascular problems?
Are you over 45 and have one or more of the following: currently smoke, high cholesterol, family history of heart attack or stroke, currently receiving medical care?
Have you ever had or do you currently have heart disease or heart attack?
Have you ever had or do you currently have heart rhythm abnormalities (arrhythmias)?
Have you ever had or do you currently have high blood pressure?
Have you ever had or do you currently have a blood disorder or bleeding problems?
Have you ever had or do you currently have asthma, wheezing, or difficulty breathing with exercise?
Have you ever had or do you currently have collapsed lung (pneumothorax)?
Have you ever had or do you currently have any lung disease (emphysema, COPD, bronchitis)?
Have you ever had or do you currently have tuberculosis?
Have you ever had or do you currently have epilepsy, seizures, or convulsions?
Have you ever had or do you currently have recurring migraine headaches or take medication to prevent them?
Have you ever had or do you currently have blackouts, fainting, or loss of consciousness?
Have you ever had or do you currently have a head injury with loss of consciousness in the past 5 years?
Have you ever had or do you currently have stroke or transient ischemic attack (TIA)?
Have you ever had or do you currently have recurring ear problems or ear surgery?
Have you ever had or do you currently have hearing loss or balance problems?
Have you ever had or do you currently have recurring sinus problems or sinus surgery?
Have you ever had or do you currently have recurring problems with stomach, intestines, or hernias?
Have you ever had or do you currently have diabetes?
Have you ever had or do you currently have back problems, back surgery, or spinal problems?
Have you ever had or do you currently have arm/leg/joint problems that could affect safe diving?
Have you ever had or do you currently have a behavioral health, mental, or psychological problem requiring treatment?
Have you ever had or do you currently have a fear of closed or open spaces (claustrophobia or agoraphobia)?
Have you ever had or do you currently have a problem with drug or alcohol abuse?
Are you currently taking prescription medications (with the exception of birth control or anti-malarial drugs)?
Have you ever had or do you currently have decompression sickness (the bends)?
Have you ever been unable to complete a dive for medical or fitness reasons?
Are you pregnant or trying to become pregnant?
questions.help_text: This question applies to female participants only.

questions.question_text: Have you had any surgery or major illness in the past 12 months?
